description.firstPart: Hi there! I'm Brandon Argel Verdeja Dom√≠nguez, and I'm
description.secondParagraph: I'm interested in high-impact projects that allow me to combine different frameworks and technologies, culminating in delivering added value to its users.
description.thirdParagraph: I am an education enthusiast, so I am constantly learning foreign languages like English, and French, programming languages, and public speaking, as they are tools that will help me share with more people and grow together.

about.studies: Shortly before graduating from Jorge Matute Remus Polytechnic Computer Engineering, I began my studies at Platzi and I decided to adopt their motto:

focus.past: Since then, I've focused on learning everything about web development, and I've had the privilege of working with amazing people and companies.

technologies.title: Here are some technologies and tools that I have been working with:

career.title: Front-End Developer
description: Platzi Master is an intensive and elite program, where only 0.01% of the best students on the platform are accepted, to turn them into the next generation of the best professionals in the technology industry, with 1:1 support from specialized and recognized technical trainers in the industry. üíª
Platzi is one of the largest online education platforms in Latin America. Where you can learn development, other languages, soft skills, even Web3 technologists and much more. üíö

schools.name: Escuela Polt√©cnica Ing. Jorge Matute Remus

career.title: Professional Computer Technologist
description: I studied the career of computer science, where I learned the basics of various programming languages and web development.
I also did internships and professional projects in which I was able to develop my skills and practice my knowledge of web development.

positions.title: Associate Learning
description: I contribute to quality assurance, working together with different teams, offering a high quality product in education used by more than 3 million students in LATAM.
Provide continuous feedback to the team to iterate on better results.
Identification, monitoring and resolution of education bugs.
Knowledge base documentation support.
Resolution of technical doubts of students of the platform.
Test the new features of the platform.

positions.title: Associate SEO
description: I contributed, creating, reviewing and improving content for the classes in the platform, mainly in the technology courses, focused in generate quality content for the students of Platzi and improve the SEO of the platform.
Content creation for the classes in the platform.
Continuous improvement of content

positions.title: Web Developer
description: Developing a web application for the mayor's office in La Paz, Bolivia.
Using technologies such as JavaScript, SCSS, storybook, and some JS libraries, such as React, Next.js, in addition to using Redux-Saga, among others.

positions.title: Front-End Developer
description: Developed and maintained code for in-house and client websites using HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, React, Firebase, Wordpress, and more.
Manually tested sites in various browsers and mobile devices to ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.
Clients included CNI Consultores, Solar Center, and more.

list.name: Movies App
list.description: I developed this project with the API Rest consumption course trilogy at Platzi, and using TMDB API.

list.name: Rick and Morty
list.description: I made this project fetching data from the Rick and Morty API, with react and an typescript, using the best practices and optimization techniques.

list.name: ToDo App
list.description: This is a project that looks pretty simple, but it has a lot of features, such as: dark/light mode, use of local storage, a search bar, drag and drop, and it was developed with react sass and typescript.

list.name: Platzi Badges
list.description: This is a project where I started learning about react, I made also a REST API to make, modify, and delete the badges, you can also register your own badge!

list.name: Music Player
list.description: Vanilla JavaScript music player, this is one of my very first projects using JavaScript.

list.name: Simon Says
list.description: Game Simon Says, with Vanilla JavaScript. Can you pass all 15 levels? Challenge your memory!
